'''Storage 101''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Storage 101 is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Ancient Sacred Mountain}}. It is not necessary to defeat the {{Enemy|Secret Source Automaton: Hunter-Seeker}} for this chest, but doing so (then defeating the {{Enemy|Tenebrous Mimesis - Secret Source Automaton: Hunter-Seeker}} that follows) will grant an additional Exquisite Chest.
